channel.title: Hello World on Jannis Brodmann
channel.description: Recent content in Hello World on Jannis Brodmann

item.title: Project I: Electrical Grid Losses
item.description: In this project I predicted short-term electrical grid losses in the regulatory zone of 50Hertz. Forecasting algorithms included a power-flow calcualtion, a SARIMAX model, an fed-forward neural network, as well as two deep learning algorithms namely a Long-Short-Term Memory and a Convolutional Neural Net. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project II: Vizualizing Renewable Energy Systems
item.description: This project visualizes the growth of energy generation from renewable sources in germany. I scraped the API of the MaStr for renewable energy system, their size, installation date and adress, generated geolocations using the Bing-API and plotted and aggregated value over time. Link to GitHub Repository
